definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
(law) legal representative of a corporation (e.g. chairman of the board of a company, principal of a school etc)

sentences.english: He suggested them read at least one book on the legal rights.
sentences.chinese: 他建议他们至少阅读一本关于法定权利的书。

sentences.english: The customs house shall make examination on the person under custody within the legal detention period.
sentences.chinese: 海关应当在法定扣留期限内对被扣留人进行审查。

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，法学院过多了，并对法定职业夸下海口。

sentences.english: The official called the 1882 "Law of Bills."
Independence Day is one of America's  principal legal holiday.
sentences.chinese: 独立日是美国主要法定节日之一。

sentences.english: Keeping the law is a legal obligation and moral requirement which manifests as the law-abiding action.
sentences.chinese: 守法是一种法定的义务和道德要求。

sentences.english: Persons with no competence shall be represented by their legal agents in administrative procedures.
sentences.chinese: 无行为能力人由他的法定代理人代为参与行政程序。

sentences.english: USCG missions are clearly defined in 'legal authorities' by the US Congress.
sentences.chinese: 美国国会以法定形式清楚地定义了USCG的使命。

sentences.english: It works for groups and ought therefore work also for legal units.
sentences.chinese: 它对集团可行，因此也应当对法定单位可行。

sentences.english: The holiday officially lasts six days, but many workers take a month off.
sentences.chinese: 法定春节假期为6天，但是很多农民工会放假一个月。

sentences.english: The chairman of the board is the legal representative of the joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 董事长是合营企业法定代表人。

sentences.english: Some drivers charge as much as ten times the legal fare .
sentences.chinese: 有些司机索取的车资高达原法定车资的十倍。

sentences.english: It is a(public) holiday in the PRC to celebrate its national day.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国的一个庆祝国庆节的法定假期。

sentences.english: The single point calibration curve method is used for the quantitative determination.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法均采用一点校正曲线法定置。

sentences.english: Usury is interest in excess of a legal rate.
sentences.chinese: 高利贷是指超过法定利率取息。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
to fulfill (one's obligations)/to carry out (a task)/to implement (an agreement)/to perform
